detaileddescription.para: Irene3000::begin(): This method is provided to start the Irene3000
Irene3000::config(): This method is provided to configure the Irene3000 shield through a configuration file
Irene3000::printConf(): This method is provided to print the configuration to the Serial Monitor
Irene3000:read(): This method is provided to read the Irene3000 sensors data

simplesect.para: json string of the sensors data

detaileddescription.para: Irene3000::readButton(): This method is provided to read the Irene3000 button
Irene3000::setGain(gain): This method is provided to set the ADS chip gain
Irene3000::readADSChannel2(gain): This method is provided to read from the ADS channel 2 . ADS Channel 2 is free and the user can connect another analog sensor to it.
Irene3000::readPh(double t): This method is provided to read the PH probe note that for the best results, PH must be correlated to Temperature.
Irene3000::readTemp(gain): This method is provided to read the Temeperature probe
Irene3000::resetParams(): This method is provided to reset the PH configuration, assuming Ideal configuration
Irene3000::calibratepH7(): This method is provided to calibrate the PH probe to 7
Irene3000::calibratepH4(): This method is provided to calibrate the PH probe to 4
Irene3000::calcpHSlop(): This method is provided to calculate th PH slope
Irene3000::gainConvert( gain : { 2/3,1,2,4,8,16 } ) This method is provided to convert the gain to Internal Constants

simplesect.para: internal representation of the ADS gain

briefdescription.para: This class is provided to manage the Irene3000 Ph/Temperature Shield.
